location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Material: Printed on paper.Dimensions: 300 x 180mm, on sheet 330 x 210mm.

mods.abstract: The plan shows Ras Al Arz, Koweit [Kuwait], with a proposed site and also the location of a beacon and a stone hut. The plan was published as Appendix 2 to a Report by David W. Hood, Supplementary to that of a Committee of Enquiry on the Lighting and Buoyage of the Persian Gulf.
